headline: Mets Owner Steve Cohen Had an Even Better Year Off the Field
summary: Steve Cohen’s  New York Mets lost to a playoff rival to end their 2024 baseball season.  The billionaire’s hedge fund, meanwhile, topped the competition.  Cohen’s  Point72 Asset Management  generated a return in 2024 of about 19% in its flagship fund, according to people familiar with the matter.
